Sentencas: This paper presents a numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming of ethane.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: From a chemical point of view, the reforming process of heavy hydrocarbons, such as ethane, is complex.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: One of the main issue is a set of undesired chemical reactions that causes the deposition of solid carbon and consequently blocks the catalytic property of a reactor.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: In the literature a carbon deposition regime is selected by thermodynamical analysis to design safe operation conditions.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: In the case of Computational Fluid Dynamic (CFD, hereafter) models each control volume should be investigated to determinate if carbon deposition is thermodynamically favourable.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: In this paper the authors combine equilibrium and kinetics analysis to simulate the steam reforming of methane-ethane rich fuel.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: The results of the computations were juxtaposed with experimental data for methane steam reforming, and good agreement was found.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: An analysis based on the kinetics of reactions was conducted to predict the influence of temperature drop and non-equilibrium composition on solid carbon deposition.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: It was found that strong non-uniform temperature distribution in the reactor causes conditions favourable for carbon deposition at the inlet of the reformer.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane

Sentencas: It was shown that equilibrium calculations, often used in the literature, are insufficient.
Titulo: A numerical analysis of heat and mass transfer during the steam reforming process of ethane
